Lot 1 is a township in Prince County, Prince Edward Island, Canada created during the 1764â€“1766 survey of Samuel Holland.  It is part of North Parish.

* Tignish
* Tignish Shore

History
The township went through various owners under feudalism when Prince Edward Island was a British colony prior to Canadian Confederation:
* Sir Philip Stephens, 1st Baronet First Secretary of the Admiralty [http://www.islandregister.com/proprietors.html] (1767-1810)
* In Chancery [http://www.islandregister.com/proprietors1838.html] (1838)
* Messrs. Palmer and Ed. Cunard, Esq.[http://www.islandregister.com/hutchinson.html] (1864)
